rules_text: When Troupe Ringleader enters the battlefield, an opponent looks at the top three cards of your library and separates them into one face up pile and one face down pile. Put one of the piles into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
notes: You choose one of those cards, then that opponent reveals another card of their choice. Put any one of the three cards into your hand, then the rest into your graveyard.
